page.title: 13 Education.
page.content: There is a small first school in the village of Winterborne Kingston. It is attended by children of five to nine years old from Winterborne Kingston and several neighbouring villages. At the present time there are forty one children in the school with two teachers. The school has a playing field and a swimming pool. At the age of nine all the children go to St. Leonard's Middle School in Blandford. When they are thirteen they got to Blandford Upper School, where they may stay until they are eighteen. There are free school buses to take the children into Blandford every day. A lot of children go to universities or polytechnics and others attend colleges in Bournemouth or Weymouth.
